column6: 6}}</ref> It was located near the [[Eagle's Eyrie]] and west of the [[Carrock]].<ref>{{H

column1: The gate was built by the [[Orcs of the Misty Mountains]] "ages" ago both as a means of escape from their tunnels and as a way to access and harass the [[Rhovanion
column2: Wilderland]]. It was always guarded.<ref name=h6/>

column1: [[Gandalf]] led [[Thorin and Company]] through that exit to escape the goblins. [[Bilbo Baggins]] also escaped from [[Gollum]] by squeezing through that stone door and losing his buttons.<ref>{{H
